ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-14T01:49:20 [Issue ID 4000-35094] urn:comicvine:4000-35094
ComicInfo.Summary:
Witness the birth of a comics legend! Mystified by his strange and extraordinary powers, Pittsburgh teenager Peter Stanchek is contacted by the mysterious Harbinger Foundation and discovers that he is not alone.
Confused by his awakening powers, Pete Stanchek is happy to let the Harbinger Foundation help him master his abilities. When Pete's best friend, Joe, points out that Pete is turning into a bad person, Harbinger founder, Toyo Harada, has Joe killed. This turns Pete against the Harbinger Foundation, so the order is given that Pete must die! But the assassins learn the hard way that Pete's power is far beyond their imagining!
- First printing, cover has pink clouds. Pink mail version that could be redeemed with coupons from issues 1 - 6. Final issue was released in MAR 1992 (with a JUN cover date). A "special announcement" (ad) said this mail version would be released in JUN 1992, however, some readers might have received their copies at a (much) later date.
- Second printing, cover has blue clouds. Harbinger title letters on the cover are red. This Blue sky version came bagged with the Harbinger Trade Paperback (NOV/DEC 1992)
Note: The Second Printing of the trade paperback (MAY 1993) wasn't poly-bagged with any copy of this zero issue.
